post.body: yes yes... good show today
yesterday my little cousin said you're his favorite rapper
yeah lots of great stuff like that out there.. some amazing SOTT rehearsal sessions where P's teaching the band new songs
believe me i told him lol.. but these younguns have their own sense of aesthetics, and it does not involve legibility :)
yes i'd rather not forego my last 5 days being this age :) but thanks nonetheless!
you saw this clip of Jamie Foxx clowning Terence Howard? http://tinyurl.com/6gg7d5
does anybody know somewhere in NY tonight where people are dancing and DJs are DJing? (this is the problem with bday the day before NYE)
I woke up early on my born day.
there's a post on dailybeast right now that I'm dying to say snarky things about, but I'm gonna resist the urge.............
new video, Hip-Hop Wargames (the only way to win is not to play): http://tinyurl.com/866er3
whew got a video done, shaking the rust off..
live video feed from our dance music special, now til 5AM: http://www.mogulus.com/illdoctrine and audio stream here http://stream.wbai.org
that live video chat felt so gratuitous and self-indulgent, and yet strangely addictive! not sure how i feel about the idea
testing mogulus http://www.mogulus.com/illdoctrine can't figure out how to get sound thru, so far
my interview for I Want My Mp3 is up: http://tr.im/2nr6 I still can't watch myself being interviewed so let me know how it looks lol
Say word, my cousin's song has 35k views http://tinyurl.com/9wpaz2 *paging @nahright*
at xmas dinner, getting updates on my cousin LD's rap career http://www.myspace.com/blackhousemafia ..he says he's working with Ron Browz
if I wanted to do a live video stream, what site would you recommend.. mogulus?
My other favorite, that introduced me to one of my favorite bands http://tinyurl.com/vkue5
My favorite xmas song, in the category of xmas songs that sound like they might involve a visit with Chris Hansen http://blip.fm/~1alr1
